Class Score

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.model.Score
public final class Score extends Object
Manages game score, lines cleared, and combo tracking. Uses JavaFX properties for reactive UI updates when values change.

  • Method Details

    • scoreProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty scoreProperty()
      Gets the score property for reactive UI binding.
      Returns:
      IntegerProperty representing the current score

    • linesProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty linesProperty()
      Gets the lines property for reactive UI binding.
      Returns:
      IntegerProperty representing the number of lines cleared

    • add

      public void add(int i)
      Adds points to the current score.
      Parameters:
      i - Points to add to the score

    • addLines

      public void addLines(int i)
      Adds to the count of lines cleared.
      Parameters:
      i - Number of lines to add

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets all score values to zero (score, lines, and combo).

    • resetLines

      public void resetLines()
      Resets the lines cleared count to zero.

    • getValue

      public int getValue()
      Gets the current score value.
      Returns:
      Current score as an integer

    • getLinesValue

      public int getLinesValue()
      Gets the current lines cleared count.
      Returns:
      Number of lines cleared as an integer

    • incrementCombo

      public void incrementCombo()
      Increments the combo counter by one. Used when consecutive line clears occur.

    • resetCombo

      public void resetCombo()
      Resets the combo counter to zero. Called when a line clear sequence is broken.

    • getCombo

      public int getCombo()
      Gets the current combo value.
      Returns:
      Current combo count as an integer

    • comboProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty comboProperty()
      Gets the combo property for reactive UI binding.
      Returns:
      IntegerProperty representing the current combo count
      See Also:
      • getCombo()
